channel.title: Hacked on RuneScape
channel.description:
Well my RS main just got hacked, lost the account and the bank, terrible. The bank was approximately 200men. Only because I had just spent weeks getting turmoil -.- So it was a good 530men.
I also had a good 4 RS Penisns registered on the account, and can no longer afford rs mems. Pins please. :l
Donations are very much appreciated, RSN is 'Gay Unit'.
I am Currently GAY WRAINBOW Varrock Big Bank.
Donation List ; I Plan On Paying Every Cent Back -
Acrodox = 1M [b]G[/b]AY[b]P[/b]RIDE I Vain I =
EDIT BY DAVIDI2 - I made the thread a bit more realistic.

item.title: Hacked on RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“I Am Sparc, post:4, topic:402039”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=499095.msg3649684#msg3649684 date=1309644594]
Im poor as fuck, Ill donate a mill.
[/quote]

@Stupit,

shut the fuck up, honestly. Acrodox didn’t seem to have a problem with it. No one said I couldnt ask for rsgp btw? I’m not making a trade.

@Acrodox,

Pm ‘Swiss Unit’[/quote]

Moron…

This isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked on RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:23, topic:402039”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=499095.msg3649786#msg3649786 date=1309647989]
Told me to shut the fuck up, shits about to go down.
For a first; many users of bots just got hacked, again so it could be affecting you, if you bot, you really shouldn’t deserve someone lending you money who earn the money legitly.
Secondly; begging for money? that’s low. maybe if you explained why and how your going to earn back the money that they lent you.
Thirdly; telling fellow users to ‘shut the fuck up’ when they’re trying to explain the rules to you is just wrong.
[/quote]

hey stupit

shut the fuck up

:P[/quote]
I lave yah. You didn’t make a stupid thread, so no hate against you.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked on RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

I Am Sparc:

Not really, had recovs and everything, I posted an recovery appeal and they said I didn’t have enough info, I provided an ip and everything. And the only thing ive done in a month on rs is pk and get turmoil. Yeah sorry for trying to enjoy the game of runescape.

So you’re not involved with any cheating communities/botting communities/private server communities, have obvious account credentials, or have followed any suspicious links ever in your life? There’s no other way you could have been ‘hacked’.

Read full topic
